definitions.definition: A small sclerite situated above the base of the costal vein in the wings of various insects , and attached to the anterolateral portion of the mesonotum .
A flat Roman roof tile with raised edges, joined together by an imbrex .
Any sea snail in the genus Tegula .

main_definition: ( entomology ) A small sclerite situated above the base of the costal vein in the wings of various insects , and attached to the anterolateral portion of the mesonotum .
secondary_definitions: ( archaeology ) A flat Roman roof tile with raised edges, joined together by an imbrex .
( malacology ) Any sea snail in the genus Tegula .
